CustomField.formula: IF( OR (ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Closed'),Customer_Due_Date__c=null,Last_Technical_Update__c=null), '', IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Open'),ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'In Progress')) , (TODAY() > DATEVALUE(Customer_Due_Date__c)) ) , 'Late', IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Open'),ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'In Progress')), (Last_Technical_Update__c< TODAY()) ) , 'Stale', IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(Risk_Assessment__c,'Red'),ISPICKVAL(Risk_Assessment__c,'Yellow'), ISPICKVAL(Risk_Assessment__c,'')), 'At Risk', '' ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Performance
